turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you order me a large pizza from empire slice house?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you order me a extra large notorious pig?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that is one extra large notorious pig. anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, i also want to order some garlic knots.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can i have two orders?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so i have two orders of garlic knots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, what kind of drinks do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we only have coke, sprite, dr pepper, and mountain dew.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what size do they come in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we only have the 2 liter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and its how much?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: its a dollar fifty.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i see. can i have a coke and a sprite.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so i have one coke and one sprite.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes, can i also have an order of the giant meatballs?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, were all out of the meatballs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i see.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: im really sorry.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no worries. i almost forgot, how many garlic knots come in an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you get 20 per order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great. i guess that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you have an extra large notorious pig, one coke, one sprite, and one garlic knots.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the total comes to thirty eight fifty. a receipt will be sent to your mobile phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the order is complete and will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great. thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. have a nice day.
